nodes.text: Mira Grant is the pseudonym of Seanan McGuire, an award-winning American author who wrote the story "The Wine in Dreams" in the novella collection Canto Bight.
McGuire is known for the urban fantasy series October Daye and InCryptid. As Mira Grant, she is known for the science fiction/horror series Newsflesh and the science fiction trilogy Parasitology.
